name: MOTDsocket
body:
### Welcome to MOTDsocket
This is a simple one man project to making a MOTD server that can give people information, much like an RSS feed. It is currently operational, but in VERY early development.

## Current Features
Uses file motd.txt to relay message to user.
Uses threading for multiple users.
Outputs connected IP's to a file.

### Authors and Contributors
Tealkine (@tealkine) is the only contributor currently, and will probably stay that way.

### Planned Development
Host multiple servers in one python server;
    e.g. - Join with port 50, get MOTD, Join with port 31337, get information etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
